Name: Pimm's Spritz
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice & mint.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: As the name suggests, this cocktail is inspired by and combines elements of both the classic Venetian Spritz and England's Pimm's Cup. The result is a lightly sparkling and very refreshing aperitif cocktail.
History: Created on 30th May 2014 by yours truly for British Airways' High Life Magazine . See our Fruit Cups and Pimm's page for more information.
Nutrition: One serving of Pimm's Spritz contains 83 calories
